name: Taekwondo Uniform
description: Experience the ultimate in Taekwondo training with our Premium Taekwondo Uniform. This high-quality dobok is designed for both comfort and durability, ensuring you can focus on your technique without distraction.
features: Made from high-quality, breathable fabric
Reinforced stitching for longevity
Designed for optimal range of motion
Official World Taekwondo Federation approved

name: Arm Guard
description: Elevate your sparring sessions with our Professional Sparring Gear Set. This comprehensive set provides maximum protection without compromising on mobility, allowing you to train and compete with confidence.
features: Full-body protection set
Lightweight and flexible design
Shock-absorbing foam padding
Easy to clean and maintain
specifications: Includes: Headgear, Chest Protector, Arm & Shin Guards, Gloves, Foot Protectors
Material: High-density EVA foam with polyurethane coating
Meets or exceeds WTF and Olympic standards

name: Hand Gloves
description: Enhance your training with our Advanced Training Pads. These durable pads are designed to withstand powerful kicks and punches, providing the perfect target for honing your techniques.
features: High-density foam core for shock absorption
Reinforced handles for secure grip
Curved design for optimal impact distribution
Suitable for both solo and partner training
specifications: Material: Synthetic leather exterior with high-density foam core
